actions.task: Investigate how AI will change Cyber Security Roles in the United Kingdom this coming decade
actions.description: Uncover how AI will transform Cyber Security Roles in the United Kingdom over the next decade
actions.context: Investigate the impact of AI on Cyber Security roles in the United Kingdom over the next decade. Focus on predictive threat detection, automated response systems, AI-driven data analysis, and the emergence of new roles such as 'AI Security Analyst' and 'Data-Driven Security Analyst'. Highlight the evolving skill requirements and the integration of AI technologies in cyber security practices.
